title: What chapters of class 11 in physics, chemistry, and mathematics are important and have a link with class 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: Physics vectors, statics, dynamics , moment of inertia,fluid dynamics, heat flow, and waves and oscillations. ChemChemical Bonding , mole concept , atomic structure, Equilibrium, Organic (go for some other book than Ncert) MathsTrigonometry, limits (V V IMP), Quadratics, conic sections, probability,AP GP HP Special series ,U should know math. Induction a bit Study hard 11. You won't regret
In maths, Relation and function Trigonometry Permutations and combinations Limits and Derivatives Probability In chem, Hydrocarbons Organic P-block Equillibrium Chemical bonding
